**2025-06-11 / @aclements, @adonovan, @bradfitz, @cherrymui, @griesemer, @neild, @rolandshoemaker**

- **memory regions** [#70257](https://go.dev/issue/70257)

**Accepted**

- none

**Declined**

- none

**Likely Accept**

- **hash: standardize the hash function** [#70471](https://go.dev/issue/70471)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ⏳
- **os: add (\*Process).WithHandle** [#70352](https://go.dev/issue/70352)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ⏳

**Likely Decline**

- **time: make UnmarshalText, UnmarshalJSON enforce strict RFC 3339 semantics** [#57912](https://go.dev/issue/57912)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ⏳

**Active**

- **cmd/fix: remove all functionality** [#73605](https://go.dev/issue/73605)
  - added to minutes
- **crypto/tls: dynamically reload root certificate authorities** [#64796](https://go.dev/issue/64796)
  - discussion ongoing
- **crypto: ignore rand io.Reader where behavior is not specified** [#70942](https://go.dev/issue/70942)
  - commented
- **doc: mention "purego" build tag convention somewhere** [#23172](https://go.dev/issue/23172)
  - discussion ongoing
- **encoding/xml: add omitzero option** [#69857](https://go.dev/issue/69857)
  - added to minutes
- **os: stop manually setting sticky bit on file creation on \*BSD, Solaris** [#68664](https://go.dev/issue/68664)
  - added to minutes
- **runtime/mainthread: add mainthread.Do for mediating access to the main thread** [#70089](https://go.dev/issue/70089)
  - commented
- **syscall: add O\_OVERLAPPED on Windows** [#73676](https://go.dev/issue/73676)
  - discussion ongoing
- **x/crypto/x509roots/fallback: export certificate bundle** [#69898](https://go.dev/issue/69898)
  - discussion ongoing

**Hold**

- **container/hash: Map, a generic hash table with custom hash function and equivalence relation** [#69559](https://go.dev/issue/69559)
  - hold for #70471
- **debug/bisect: publish x/tools/internal/bisect** [#67140](https://go.dev/issue/67140)
  - hold for @rsc
- **go/types: add Hasher{,IgnoreTags} types** [#69420](https://go.dev/issue/69420)
  - hold for #70471
- **os: convenience function for one-off Root operations** [#73168](https://go.dev/issue/73168)
  - put on hold
- **regexp: add iterator forms of matching methods** [#61902](https://go.dev/issue/61902)
  - hold for @rsc
- **x/sys/unix: add methods to convert between time.Time and unix.PtpClockTime on Linux** [#70032](https://go.dev/issue/70032)
  - put on hold
